headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping the Carrier Global Investment Story
summary: Carrier Global’s consensus analyst price target has recently decreased from $74.29 to $72.94, highlighting a modest shift in market sentiment. This downward revision comes as analysts weigh the company’s strong performance in areas like commercial HVAC, while also considering persistent headwinds in residential sales and evolving market challenges. Stay tuned to discover how you can stay informed on these evolving analyst perspectives and what they could mean for Carrier Global’s future. Stay...
